page.title: 12A Day in the Life of-E.Cdr.
page.content:
In the morning I get up at 7.30am.
I get washed and dressed and go downstairs to have my breakfast at 8.00am.After that I pack my bag and get my coat and shoes on and go to school.On my way I go to the shop to get some sweets for playtime.School starts at 9.00am.I usually start with Maths for my school work.I have my interval at 10.40am.I have Art or Craft when I go back into school. At 12.30pm I have my lunch.At 1.30pm school starts again.We do some History Art, P.E. or English.At 3.15pm I go home, get changed, and go out with my friends to play sardines mostly. When I go in I watch T.V. or read a book and go to my bed at about 10.30pm.
by Marie Cannon
